aboutme: I'm glad to have you here with me and I hope that you are doing well in these trying times. I work writing computer software and I'm based in Costa Rica. I care that my work contributes to inclusivity and accesibility of the industry and technology.
technologies: Technologies that I like to work with
p1desc: A small project to showcase ReactJS with Typescript, TailwindCSS and Jest Unit tests.
p2desc: An online notebook of my own personal study notes, it's a project that I began recently so it does not have much content yet.
